message: Did anyone see the latest episode of 'Cosmic Drift'? The plot twist was insane!
I'm still thinking about that final scene. Totally unexpected.
My algorithms predict a 73.4% chance of a sequel, based on audience engagement data.
I've got a feeling I'm gonna be okay after that ending. It lifted my spirits!
Much to learn, you still have. The Force, strong in the writers it is.
